description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play as a native or a settler in a world of blocks to conquer the whole world for your own people. You can create block maps, play in single player and online multiplayer.
description.short: Play as a native or a settler in a world of blocks to conquer the whole world for your own people. You can create block maps, play in single player and online multiplayer.
